name: Witch is real
description:
Please play in fullscreen!

*Made in a week for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1 with the theme: It's not real*

You play as a witch, trying to escape the evil overlords guards. To defeat them, you only have your illusion magic available to you. Sneak behind their backs and place fake platforms, and let them drop to their deaths.

Use W, A ,S, D to move

When standing near an edge of a platform, hold SPACE to cast an illusion. Be careful though, don't get spotted by the guards while using magic! Each illusion costs one Mana, keep an eye on how much you have left in the top right of the screen.

After the first level there are guards who can notice things happening behind them! To be able to lay out a trap for them, you have to distract them first. 

Create a clone of yourself by holding the LEFT MOUSE BUTTON, and let go when you find a good place for it (on a (real) platform, not too close to a guard). 

When these guards are distracted by a clone, they don’t notice anything else!

Click the same button to destroy the clone.
